properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 16 at 3:21AM PST until February 18 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and steep
seas building to 7 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena out 10 nm.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 9 AM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to the steep waves mentioned
above there is a swell around 7 feet at 12 seconds that will
slowly diminish through tonight. There is also a long period
swell building into the waters this morning and peaking around 7
feet at 15 seconds on Monday.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PST TUESDAY
